37  u8 port ;
38 } device_periph_t;

58 typedef struct MCU_PACK {
59  pio_t cs ;
60  u8 width ;
61  u8 format ;
62  u8 mode ;
63  u8 reserved0;
64 } device_spi_cfg_t;

89 #define DEVICE_MAX_ADC_CHANNELS 8
90 
96 typedef struct MCU_PACK {
97  u16 reference ;
98  i8 channels[DEVICE_MAX_ADC_CHANNELS] ;
99 } device_adc_cfg_t;

104 #define DEVICE_MAX_PWM_CHANNELS 8
105 
111 typedef struct {
112  u32 top ;

114  i8 channels[DEVICE_MAX_PWM_CHANNELS] ;
115 } device_pwm_cfg_t;

118 #define MCU_CFG_SIZE_MAX 32
119 
124 typedef struct MCU_PACK {
125  device_periph_t periph ;
126  u8 pin_assign ;
127  u32 bitrate ;
128  union {
129  device_spi_cfg_t spi ;
130  device_pwm_cfg_t pwm ;
131  device_adc_cfg_t adc ;
132  device_uart_cfg_t uart ;
133  device_i2c_cfg_t i2c ;
134  pio_t pio[4] ;
135  } pcfg;
136  const void * dcfg ;
137  void * state ;
138 } device_cfg_t;
139 
140 
145 typedef struct MCU_PACK {
146  int tid ;
147  int flags ;
148  int loc ;
149  union {
150  const void * cbuf ;
151  void * buf ;
152  const char * cchbuf ;
153  char * chbuf ;
154  };
155  int nbyte ;
156  mcu_callback_t callback ;
157  void * context ;
158 } device_transfer_t;
159 
160 typedef int (*device_driver_open_t)(const device_cfg_t*);
161 typedef int (*device_driver_ioctl_t)(const device_cfg_t*, int, void*);
162 typedef int (*device_driver_read_t)(const device_cfg_t*, device_transfer_t *);
163 typedef int (*device_driver_write_t)(const device_cfg_t*, device_transfer_t *);
164 typedef int (*device_driver_close_t)(const device_cfg_t*);
165 
174 typedef struct MCU_PACK {
175  device_driver_open_t open ;
176  device_driver_ioctl_t ioctl ;
177  device_driver_read_t read ;
178  device_driver_write_t write ;
179  device_driver_close_t close ;
180 } device_driver_t;
181 
186 typedef struct {
187  char name[NAME_MAX] ;
188  u8 uid ;
189  u8 gid ;
190  u16 mode ;
191  device_driver_t driver ;
192  device_cfg_t cfg ;
193 } device_t;
194 
195 
196 #define DEVICE_MODE(mode_value, uid_value, gid_value, type) .mode = mode_value | type, \
197  .uid = uid_value, \
198  .gid = gid_value
199 
200 #define DEVICE_DRIVER(driver_name) .driver.open = driver_name##_open, \
201  .driver.close = driver_name##_close, \
202  .driver.ioctl = driver_name##_ioctl, \
203  .driver.read = driver_name##_read, \
204  .driver.write = driver_name##_write
205 
217 #define DEVICE_PERIPH(device_name, periph_name, port_number, mode_value, uid_value, gid_value, device_type) { \
218  .name = device_name, \
219  DEVICE_MODE(mode_value, uid_value, gid_value, device_type), \
220  DEVICE_DRIVER(periph_name), \
221  .cfg.periph.port = port_number \
222 }
223 
224 #define DEVICE_TERMINATOR { \
225  .driver.open = NULL \
226 }
227 
228 #ifndef __link
229 
230 static inline bool device_is_terminator(const device_t * dev);
231 bool device_is_terminator(const device_t * dev){
232  if ( dev->driver.open == NULL ){
233  return true;
234  }
235  return false;
236 }
237 #endif
